sentence.Network_en: The spoken word is immediate but lacks permanence.
sentence.Network_cn: 口头之言便捷，但缺乏持久性。

sentence.Network_en: Anything which threatens the permanence of the treaty is a threat to peace.
sentence.Network_cn: 任何对条约持续生效构成威胁的因素都将危及和平。

sentence.Network_en: They gradually realized the permanence of their condition.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们渐渐意识到他们的这种状况将永久地持续下去。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from medieval Latin permanentia (perhaps via French), from permanent- 'remaining to the end', from the verb permanere

entry.def: Something that is permanent lasts for ever.

example.ex: Heavy drinking can cause permanent damage to the brain...
example.tran: 酗酒能造成永久性大脑损伤。
该问题一劳永逸的解决办法

entry.tran: （尤指问题或困难）不断出现的，一直存在的
entry.def: You use permanent to describe situations or states that keep occurring or which seem to exist all the time; used especially to describe problems or difficulties.

example.tran: 他们觉得一直处于威胁之下。

entry.def: A permanent employee is one who is employed for an unlimited length of time.

example.ex: At the end of the probationary period you will become a permanent employee.
example.tran: 试用期结束后,你将成为长期雇员。

entry.def: Your permanent home or your permanent address is the one at which you spend most of your time or the one that you return to after having stayed in other places.

example.ex: York Cottage was as near to a permanent home as the children knew...
example.tran: 在孩子们眼中,约克小屋最像一个安定的家。

entry.def: A permanent is a treatment where a hair stylist curls your hair and treats it with a chemical so that it stays curly for several months.

means.word_mean: 1. the property of being able to exist for an indefinite duration

auth_sentence.content: It takes a long time to build anything of permanence.

auth_sentence.content: Permanence faded as a goal of art-making.
auth_sentence.res_content: Permanence faded as a goal of art-making.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Permanence faded as a goal of art-making.

auth_sentence.content: We can't have permanence and flexibility at the same time.
auth_sentence.res_content: We can't have permanence and flexibility at the same time.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We can't have permanence and flexibility at the same time.
